column3:
Concept ACK

Could  you please squash those commits? Commits should be as small as possible but still [atomic](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#contributor-workflow).

It'd be a good idea to note that the name has changed in the release notes, as this has the (small) potential to break some code that depends on what decodescript returns; we probably won't release this until v0.13\n
@petertodd If they depend on OP_NOP2 being returned, they are likely to be more subtley broken by _not_ updating this...\n
Agreed with @luke-jr, the meaning has changed, a break would be the best-case result for anyone depending on this.\n
Updated with release note update and the compatibility define removed.\n
@paveljanik Only if the verbose option is specified, the json output contains an asm script field. Standard hex output is not.\n
@mb300sd Right. Thank you. Can you please add "(in verbose mode)"?\n

@luke-jr That's a reasonable idea; let's remove OP_NOP2.

Release notes look good, thanks!

I am not sure this "compatibility" should be retained. If someone is specifying OP_NOP2, they may actually be expecting OP_NOP2 behaviour. Better to error and let them explicitly change to OP_CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY.\n
